name: Alakenisland
description:
Explore the island, collect treasure, buy and unlock powerful items each with different unique effects such as damage, healing and freezing, combine and strategize the effects of your items to use them to destroy enemies as quick as possible, dodge attacks from turrets all over the island such as rockets and lasers, infiltrate a highly secured facility with different types of dangers and puzzles, drive a boat armored with a cannon to aim and shoot the pirate battleship until it goes down.

Features

-Sword combat

-Inventory full of attack items each with different unique effects.

-Involves a whole island free to explore in open world.

-Pirate enemies to battle in Action RPG style.

-Online and Local Multiplayer to strategize your items, team up with your friends or fight against them.

-A Pirate Battleship Boss Battle.

-Driving a cannon armored boat in the ocean.

-A facility containing platforming with obstacle courses to evade and jump over.

-Using a Glider to fly.

-Using a Grappling hook to swing over to places.
